answers.answer: the wait is the worst part...   I failed my 1hr and have to go do the 2hr now.   I was told don't leave and just relax or it will throw off your sugars.  Moving makes you metabolize and that makes your sugar rise.   I wish i had optional  flavors but its orange or orange here.

question: Ok.... so my drink (fruit punch flavor) wasn't so bad.... however I now have a headache.  Every time I drink fruit punch I get heart burn and a bad headache. Waiting for the blood draw now.
title: gestational diabetes test
